TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit CodeNamespaceImport extends System.CodeDom.CodeObject

Docs.summary: Represents a namespace import directive that indicates a namespace to use.

remarks.format:
## Remarks CodeNamespaceImport can be used to represent a namespace import directive.
In most languages, a namespace import directive causes visibility of the types within the imported namespaces to code that references types in the imported namespaces.
> [!NOTE] > Use fully qualified type references to avoid potential ambiguity.
## Examples The following example code demonstrates use of a CodeNamespaceImport to import the CodeNamespaceImport namespace:
[!code-cpp[CodeNamespaceImportExample#2](../../add/codesnippet/CPP/t-system.codedom.codenam_2_1.cpp)] [!code-vb[CodeNamespaceImportExample#2](../../add/codesnippet/VisualBasic/t-system.codedom.codenam_2_1.vb)] [!code-cs[CodeNamespaceImportExample#2](../../add/codesnippet/CSharp/t-system.codedom.codenam_2_1.cs)]
